txt.en: 'Good [placeholder], you seem a well-travelled one, I dare say! You have just moved into the Homesteads of the Eastfold, have you not? If you are looking for a home with a slow pace to life, you have come to the right place. Still, we pride ourselves on keeping the neighbourhood both clean and friendly. I hope that you will join us in building a brighter community, my friend!'
'Good, good! I have many things that need doing. If we all pitch in, they will be done in no time at all!'
The rural foothills of Rohan are in need of pioneers and tree-friends. Seleflad has suggested you might take the opportunity to purchase your own home in Rohan.
Seleflad can be found at Edoras or the Eastfold Homesteads.\n\nYou should talk to Seleflad.
Mead Hall in the Homesteads of the Eastfold
